class_description:
This class is used to read entries from a zip file. Unless otherwise noted, passing a null argument to a constructor
 or method in this class will cause a NullPointerException to be
 thrown.

params.param_description: the name of the zip file

Methods.method_description:
Opens a zip file for reading.

 
First, if there is a security manager, its checkRead
 method is called with the name argument as its argument
 to ensure the read is allowed.

 
The UTF-8 charset is used to
 decode the entry names and comments.
See also:

params.param_description: the ZIP file to be opened for reading
the mode in which the file is to be opened

Methods.method_description:
Opens a new ZipFile to read from the specified
 File object in the specified mode.  The mode argument
 must be either OPEN_READ or OPEN_READ | OPEN_DELETE.

 
First, if there is a security manager, its checkRead
 method is called with the name argument as its argument to
 ensure the read is allowed.

 
The UTF-8 charset is used to
 decode the entry names and comments
See also:

params.param_description: the ZIP file to be opened for reading

Methods.method_description:
Opens a ZIP file for reading given the specified File object.

 
The UTF-8 charset is used to
 decode the entry names and comments.

params.param_description: the ZIP file to be opened for reading
the mode in which the file is to be opened

the charset to
        be used to decode the ZIP entry name and comment that are not
        encoded by using UTF-8 encoding (indicated by entry's general
        purpose flag).

Methods.method_description:
Opens a new ZipFile to read from the specified
 File object in the specified mode.  The mode argument
 must be either OPEN_READ or OPEN_READ | OPEN_DELETE.

 
First, if there is a security manager, its checkRead
 method is called with the name argument as its argument to
 ensure the read is allowed.
See also:

params.param_description: the name of the zip file

the charset to
        be used to decode the ZIP entry name and comment that are not
        encoded by using UTF-8 encoding (indicated by entry's general
        purpose flag).

Methods.method_description:
Opens a zip file for reading.

 
First, if there is a security manager, its checkRead
 method is called with the name argument as its argument
 to ensure the read is allowed.
See also:

params.param_description: the ZIP file to be opened for reading

The charset to be
        used to decode the ZIP entry name and comment (ignored if
        the  language
        encoding bit of the ZIP entry's general purpose bit
        flag is set).

Methods.method_description: Opens a ZIP file for reading given the specified File object.

Closes the ZIP file.
 
 Closing this ZIP file will close all of the input streams
 previously returned by invocations of the getInputStream method.

return_description: an enumeration of the ZIP file entries

Methods.method_description: Returns an enumeration of the ZIP file entries.

return_description: the comment string for the zip file, or null if none

Methods.method_description: Returns the zip file comment, or null if none.

return_description: the zip file entry, or null if not found

Methods.method_description:
Returns the zip file entry for the specified name, or null
 if not found.

return_description:
the input stream for reading the contents of the specified
 zip file entry.

Methods.method_description:
Returns an input stream for reading the contents of the specified
 zip file entry.

 
 Closing this ZIP file will, in turn, close all input
 streams that have been returned by invocations of this method.

return_description: the path name of the ZIP file

Methods.method_description: Returns the path name of the ZIP file.

return_description: the number of entries in the ZIP file

Methods.method_description: Returns the number of entries in the ZIP file.

return_description: an ordered Stream of entries in this ZIP file

Methods.method_description:
Return an ordered Stream over the ZIP file entries.
 Entries appear in the Stream in the order they appear in
 the central directory of the ZIP file.
